entities.name: deathly hallows
entities.description: The Deathly Hallows are mentioned as a sign on Ignotus's grave, indicating that the three brothers in the story were actually the original owners of the Hallows.

entities.name: ignotus
entities.description: Ignotus is mentioned as having a grave with the sign of the Deathly Hallows, and he is also one of the Peverell brothers.

entities.name: antioch
entities.description: Antioch is mentioned as one of the Peverell brothers, along with Ignotus and Cadmus.

entities.name: cadmus
entities.description: Cadmus is mentioned as one of the Peverell brothers, along with Antioch and Ignotus.

entities.name: peverell brothers
entities.description: The Peverell brothers are mentioned as being the original owners of the Hallows, consisting of Antioch, Cadmus, and Ignotus.

entities.name: hallows
entities.description: The Hallows are mentioned as being owned by the Peverell brothers, and are also referred to as the Deathly Hallows.

relationships.description: The sign of the Deathly Hallows is on Ignotus's grave, indicating a connection between the two.
Antioch is one of the Peverell brothers, indicating that he is a member of the group.
Cadmus is one of the Peverell brothers, indicating that he is a member of the group.
Ignotus is one of the Peverell brothers, indicating that he is a member of the group.
